Design Practice and Strategy: (B) Advertising and Moving Image Production

Students’ progression through the syllabus, aims and learning outcomes of this module B build on and refine those delivered in the previous module A in year 2 semester 1. They will further develop their knowledge of how to create advertising and moving image production and how to integrate these elements into an integrated communications strategy to realise a self-initiated brief. They will tailor their learning to their own areas of interest (Advertising, Marketing, PR) to enrich communication skills while focusing on specific interests, fostering an environment of personal and professional growth

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Formulate a comprehensive design brief, incorporating advertising and moving image materials that demonstrate an understanding of key components required for a design project.

+  Use strategic capabilities by integrating a custom strategy to realising a design brief.

+  Display critical thinking and professional communication skills through a visual report and pitch presentation.

+  Evidence autonomous learning and professional growth through own reflection.
